articles.title: Mudafy raises $10M in Founders Fund-led Series A to fix LatAm’s ‘broken’ real estate process
articles.description: Mudafy, which operates in Argentina and Mexico, has raised $10M for its fast-growing digital real estate brokerage.
articles.content:
Mudafy, a tech-enabled real estate broker operating in Latin America, has raised $10 million in a Series A round of funding led by San Francisco-based Founders Fund.
Founded in mid-2019, Mudafy operates with a typical digital brokerage model — aiming... [4220 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft launches Outlook Lite for low-powered Android phones
articles.description: Microsoft has launched its lightweight Outlook Lite Android app, which is suitable for low-end Android devices and regions with data connectivity issues. The app has a download size of less than 5MB compared to more than 80MB (depending on the device) for the regular version. The app is currently available in select countries including Argentina, […]

articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: Wallabies’ worst fears realised after star’s crushing injury update
articles.content:

articles.title: Soccer Player Arrested in Argentina After Sucker-Punching Woman Ref
articles.description: The player attacked the referee from behind. Luckily, his punch seemed to mostly miss her head, but she was still taken to a hospital.
articles.content:
A footballer in Buenos Aires was arrested after he sucker-punched a woman referee from behind.
The attack came after the player was called for a foul and one of his teammates was issued a yellow card.

articles.title: Argentina exported $3.2 bln in farm products in July -export chamber
articles.description: Argentine exports of grain, oilseeds, and their derivatives hit $3.16 billion in July.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Aug 1 (Reuters) - Argentine exports of grain, oilseeds, and their derivatives hit $3.16 billion in July, the South American country's CIARA-CEC chamber of oilseed crushers and export companies said on Monday.
